Shivani Chopra lives with her ill sister and brother-in-law. She is employed as an air-hostess and one day meets a very wealthy and spoil business tycoon, Vijay Agnihotri, on his business flight. On the flight, Vijay is accidentally hurt and Shivani attempts to pamper him. He eventually mistook Shivani's pampering for love and goes home and tells his mother, Miss. Padma Agnihotri of his love. But when he and his mother go to Shivani's house with the marriage proposal, he is shock to see that Shivani is getting married to an airline pilot, Ashok Chopra. Unable to bear this shock Vijay attempts suicide but survive. He tries his best to forget Shivani but is unable to do so and continues to woo her even though she is married and have a daughter. He eventually murder Shivani's husband, Ashok Chopra and falsely accuse her and have her sent to jail. While she is serving her sentence, Vijay tortures her family members killing her sister and daughter in a car accident. The questions remain what will be the outcome of Shivani and her future and how and when Vijay's obsession will come to and end?::raj (krazymonster@ymail.com)
